languages.text: "Не думаю, что их можно спасти, элантах. Даже отсюда я вижу, как неестественно вывернуты суставы и подрезаны сухожи..."
"I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly clipped the tendons are..."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что их можно спасти, элантах. Даже отсюда я вижу, как неестественно вывернуты суставы и подрезаны сухожи..."

traits.locale_text: "I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly the tendons clipped are even from here..."
"I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly the tendons clipped are even from here..."
"I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly the tendons clipped are..."
"I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly the tendons clipped are..."
"I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly clipped the tendons are..."
"I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly clipped the tendons are..."

languages.text: « Je ne pense pas qu'ils puissent être sauvés, elantach. Je perçois d'ici que leurs articulations ont été démises et leurs tendons tranchés... »
languages.original_text: "I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly clipped the tendons are..."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne pense pas qu'ils puissent être sauvés, elantach. Je perçois d'ici que leurs articulations ont été démises et leurs tendons tranchés... »

languages.text: “这些人恐怕没救了，外界人。即便是站在这里，我也能看到他们的关节变形多么严重，筋腱被割得多么残缺……”
languages.original_text: "I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly clipped the tendons are..."

traits.locale_text: “这些人恐怕没救了，外界人。即便是站在这里，我也能看到他们的关节变形多么严重，筋腱被割得多么残缺……”

languages.text: 「エランタよ。私には彼らが助かるとは思えない。ここから見ていても分かるが、彼らに関節は不自然にねじれ、足の腱もひどく打ち込まれているようだ…」
languages.original_text: "I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly clipped the tendons are..."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ。私には彼らが助かるとは思えない。ここから見ていても分かるが、彼らに関節は不自然にねじれ、足の腱もひどく打ち込まれているようだ…」

languages.text: "Ich glaube nicht, dass sie gerettet werden können, Elantach. Ich erkenne sogar von hier, wie unnatürlich ihre Gelenke verdreht sind und wie ihre Sehnen herunterhängen ..."
languages.original_text: "I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly clipped the tendons are..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube nicht, dass sie gerettet werden können, Elantach. Ich erkenne sogar von hier, wie unnatürlich ihre Gelenke verdreht sind und wie ihre Sehnen herunterhängen ..."

languages.text: «No creo que se les pueda salvar, elantach. Desde aquí puedo ver que tienen los miembros descoyuntados y les han cortado los tendones a la altura de...».
languages.original_text: "I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly clipped the tendons are..."

traits.locale_text: «No creo que se les pueda salvar, elantach. Desde aquí puedo ver que tienen los miembros descoyuntados y les han cortado los tendones a la altura de...».

languages.text: "Onları kurtarabileceğimizi sanmıyorum elantach. Eklemlerinin nasıl büküldüğünü, tendonlarının ne kadar hasar aldığını buradan bile görebiliyorum..."
languages.original_text: "I do not think they can be saved, elantach. I can see even from where I stand how unnaturally twisted the joints and how badly clipped the tendons are..."

traits.locale_text: "Onları kurtarabileceğimizi sanmıyorum elantach. Buradan bile görebiliyorum… Eklemlerinin nasıl büküldüğünü, tendonlarının ne kadar hasar aldığını…"
